title: Exquisite Diamond and Gemstone Haaram - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: Crafted in 22K Yellow Gold with a Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut diamonds (VS clarity
and vibrant sapphire beads. Additional ruby accents.
features: This stunning haaram showcases intricate floral motifs meticulously set with diamonds. The central pendant features a large, pear-shaped emerald surrounded by smaller emeralds and diamonds. The design incorporates delicate peacock (Mayura) motifs, a symbol of beauty and royalty. The necklace also incorporates delicate gold dangling details
colors: Primarily gold and white (diamonds) with pops of vibrant green (emeralds) and royal blue (sapphires). The ruby accents provide a subtle touch of red
occasions: and other special occasions. Ideal for brides seeking a show-stopping piece or for heirloom investments. Suitable for traditional Telugu ceremonies like Seemantham and Half-Saree functions.
description: A true statement piece that seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The high-quality diamonds and gemstones ensure lasting brilliance and value. The intricate craftsmanship and Hyderabadi polish add a touch of royal sophistication. This haaram is more than just jewelry; it's an investment in artistry and cultural heritage. A timeless treasure to be cherished for generations.
